overview:
Vener Avendanio Sarmiento is a web professional based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. Currently working as a Project Manager in Landmark Group, one of the largest retail conglomerates in the Middle East and India, the Landmark Group has a diverse portfolio of retail and hospitality brands such as: Home Centre, Babyshop, Centrepoint, Splash, Shoemark, Lifestyle, Max Hotel, eMax, Max and many others.

Vener has over 12 years of experience in Graphic Design and Web Development. Currently, his passion is into HTML 5 and Mobile Web App development. For more info, please visit his website at: www.venersarmiento.com
